pages.text: This section is aligned so that new items can only start on the left hand page. I may have a lot to say about specific items, so be sure to turn the page to read the data on them.$(br2)Don't forget that bookmarks and the index both exist.

pages.title: Table of Contents
pages.text: Oh, I didn't write a table of contents here.

pages.title: Furnator (Starter)
pages.text: The furnator is an FE generator that generates energy from solid Furnace fuel like coal and wood. Higher tiers generate more FE, and generate it faster.$(br2) $(l:powah/generators#grey-powah-generators-toc)Back to TOC$()

pages.title: Tricks
pages.text: I don't know any tricks, sorry

pages.title: Magmator (Starter)
pages.text: The Magmator is an FE generator that generates energy from high temperature fluids like lava. Higher tiers generate more FE, and generate it faster.$(br2) $(l:powah/generators#grey-powah-generators-toc)Back to TOC$()
